channel.title: CVE Feed for ABB -- Symphony Plus S+ Operations
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ABB -- Symphony Plus S+ Operations

item.title: CVE-2023-0228|2024-08-02T05:02:43.944Z -- abb -- symphony%20plus%20s%2B%20operations
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in ABB Symphony Plus S+ Operations.This issue affects Symphony Plus S+ Operations: from 2.X through 2.1 SP2, 2.2, from 3.X through 3.3 SP1, 3.3 SP2.

item.title: CVE-2024-0335|2024-08-01T18:04:49.016Z -- abb -- symphony%20plus%20s%2B%20operations
item.description:
ABB has internally identified a vulnerability in the ABB VPNI feature of the S+ Control API component which may be used by several Symphony Plus products (e.g., S+ Operations, S+ Engineering and S+ Analyst)
This issue affects Symphony Plus S+ Operations: from 3..0;0 through 3.3 SP1 RU4, from 2.1;0 through 2.1 SP2 RU3, from 2.0;0 through 2.0 SP6 TC6; Symphony Plus S+ Engineering: from 2.1 through 2.3 RU3; Symphony Plus S+ Analyst: from 7.0.0.0 through 7.2.0.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-0335|2024-04-03T18:53:25.236Z -- abb -- symphony%20plus%20s%2B%20operations
item.description:
ABB has internally identified a vulnerability in the ABB VPNI feature of the S+ Control API component which may be used by several Symphony Plus products (e.g., S+ Operations, S+ Engineering and S+ Analyst)
This issue affects Symphony Plus S+ Operations: from 3..0;0 through 3.3 SP1 RU4, from 2.1;0 through 2.1 SP2 RU3, from 2.0;0 through 2.0 SP6 TC6; Symphony Plus S+ Engineering: from 2.1 through 2.3 RU3; Symphony Plus S+ Analyst: from 7.0.0.0 through 7.2.0.2.
